contents.item: Your voice could go to where your feet could not go.

contents.item: Love powers my heart and color powers my soul.

contents.item: Knowledge is NOT power. The correct application of knowledge is power.

contents.item: Your environment will eat your goals and plans for breakfast.

contents.item: Your right in a civilized society is to have freedom.

contents.item: When you live in light, you live under God’s rulership.

contents.item: The number one price of ignorance is destruction.

contents.item: There is no such thing as loving a child too much.

contents.item: Statistics, likelihoods, and probabilities mean everything to men, nothing to God.

contents.item: Atât de mare e puterea adevărului care, precum binele, se răspândește de la sine.

contents.item: We are at our most powerful the moment we no longer need to be powerful.

contents.item: Politeness is the first thing people lose once they get the power.

contents.item: Faith in God will elevate you to next level blessings.

contents.item: Believe that your life is not ordinary and never look down on what you can do to impact a life.

contents.item: If one is to rule, and to continue ruling, one must be able to dislocate the sense of reality.

contents.item: A poor, who hates power, once become powerful, hates poor.

contents.item: Keep your best wishes, close to your heart and watch what happens

contents.item: While fear depletes power, faith gives wings for the soul’s elevation.

contents.item: If there is a construction or a pathway in the spirit to be made, it is the way of godliness.

contents.item: The power of love can spread magic to the world like nothing else.

contents.item: If the weeds are removed and there is nothing planted, it is the weeds that will keep growing.

contents.item: Godliness is not just a doctrine, a belief or a principle, it has a personality.

contents.item: Recognizing power in another does not diminish your own.
